summary.description:
Accurate and Robust Monocular SLAM with Omnidirectional Cameras.

A real-time robust monocular visual SLAM system based on ORB-SLAM for fisheye cameras, without rectifying or cropping the input images.

We develop an improved monocular visual SLAM system by using omnidirectional cameras. Our method extends the ORB-SLAM2 framework with the enhanced unified camera model (EUCM) as a projection function, which can be applied to catadioptric systems and wide-angle fisheye cameras. Without rectifying or cropping the input images, the proposed system can use the full area of the images even with strong distortion.
